name: The Shadows of Sergoth
overview: Peace is back in the kingdom of Chrisandia. But once again strange rumours are spreading in the taverns of the capital, Cedicus. Everything leads us to believe that evil lurks again in the very heart of the city. Lone warrior with talents magnified by ancient magical runes, dare you penetrate the depths of Sergoth's palace to discover and face the shadows that are eating away at your kingdom?
